function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of trust in existing safeguards for research data","Impact":"Exacerbation of existing gaps and perpetuation of health inequities","Mitigation":"Appropriate engagement of patient groups to ensure individuals are informed about how their data will be used for research","Technologies":"Data privacy and security technologies, patient data management platforms","People":"Research participants, individuals involved in research","Owner":"Research communities, medical institutions"},{"Description":"Challenges in sharing medical data at the individual patient level","Impact":"Potential privacy breaches and misuse of sensitive patient data","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict data access controls, encryption of sensitive data, and adherence to data protection regulations","Technologies":"Data encryption, access control systems, secure data storage solutions","People":"Clinical trialists, medical researchers","Owner":"Medical institutions, regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Infrequent audit and enforcement of data sharing by scientific journals and governing bodies","Impact":"Inadequate oversight leading to data misuse and integrity issues","Mitigation":"Establishment of regular auditing processes and strict enforcement of data sharing policies","Technologies":"Data auditing tools, compliance management systems, data verification technologies","People":"Scientific journals, governing bodies","Owner":"Regulatory agencies, research organizations"}]}
